tool_description: Sorts file search results based on various criteria such as name, size, date, or path depth with ascending/descending options.

file_paths.description: Array of file paths to sort

sort_by.description: Sorting criteria: name, size, modified_date, created_date, path_depth, extension

ascending.description: Sort in ascending order (true) or descending (false)

limit.description: Maximum number of results to return (1-10000)

error_messages: Empty file list: Provide at least one file path to sort.
Invalid sort criteria: Use one of [name, size, modified_date, created_date, path_depth, extension].
Invalid limit: Value must be between 1 and 10000.
File access error: Cannot access file information needed for sorting.
Sort operation failed: Unable to complete sorting due to system error.
usage: Provide file_paths array and sort_by criteria. Optionally set ascending order, secondary sort, and result limit. Returns sorted file list based on specified criteria.

sorted_files.description: Array of file paths sorted according to specified criteria

total_files.description: Total number of files in the sorted result

sort_criteria_used.description: Description of the sorting criteria applied
